setattribute.xpath: /recipes/recipe [ contains(@craft_area, 'campfire') and not(contains(@name, 'foodCharredMeat')) and not(contains(@name, 'drinkCanRiverWater')) and not(contains(@name, 'drinkCanBoiledWater')) and not(contains(@name, 'foodGrilledCorn')) and not(contains(@name, 'foodGrilledPotato')) and not(contains(@name, 'foodOmelet')) and not(contains(@name, 'foodYuccaChips')) and not(contains(@name, 'foodCornChips')) and not(contains(@name, 'foodGrilledMeat')) and not(contains(@name, 'foodGrilledMushrooms')) ]
setattribute.name: craft_area
